channel.title: CVE Feed for CodeAstrology Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CodeAstrology Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-48768|2024-08-02T21:37:55.076Z -- codeastrology%20team -- quantity%20plus%20minus%20button%20for%20woocommerce%20by%20codeastrology
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CodeAstrology Team Quantity Plus Minus Button for WooCommerce by CodeAstrology.This issue affects Quantity Plus Minus Button for WooCommerce by CodeAstrology: from n/a through 1.1.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-37554|2024-08-02T03:57:39.686Z -- codeastrology%20team -- ultraaddons%20elementor%20lite%20%28header%20%26%20footer%20builder%2C%20menu%20builder%2C%20cart%20icon%2C%20shortcode%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodeAstrology Team UltraAddons Elementor Lite (Header & Footer Builder, Menu Builder, Cart Icon, Shortcode).This issue affects UltraAddons Elementor Lite (Header & Footer Builder, Menu Builder, Cart Icon, Shortcode): from n/a through 1.1.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-37554|2024-07-06T16:12:55.519Z -- codeastrology%20team -- ultraaddons%20elementor%20lite%20%28header%20%26%20footer%20builder%2C%20menu%20builder%2C%20cart%20icon%2C%20shortcode%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodeAstrology Team UltraAddons Elementor Lite (Header & Footer Builder, Menu Builder, Cart Icon, Shortcode).This issue affects UltraAddons Elementor Lite (Header & Footer Builder, Menu Builder, Cart Icon, Shortcode): from n/a through 1.1.6.
